tuv.seg: Under the Adoptive Leave Act 1995, as amended by the Adoptive Leave Act 2005 only the adoptive mother is entitled to avail of adoptive leave from employment, except in the case where a male is the sole adopter

Faoi bhun an Achta um Shaoire Uchtaíoch 1995, arna leasú leis an Acht um Shaoire Uchtaíoch 2005 (pdf) níl cead ag aon duine saoire uchtaíoch a thógáil seachas an mháthair uchtála, ach amháin nuair a bhíonn leanbh á uchtú ag fear singil
Since 1 March 2007 you are entitled to 24 weeks' adoptive leave
Ón 1 Márta 2007, nó i ndiaidh an dáta seo, is féidir leat saoire uchtaíoch de 24 seachtain a thógáil
You are also entitled to take 16 weeks' additional unpaid adoptive leave after your adoptive leave ends – see below
Ina theannta sin, is féidir leat saoire uchtaíoch neamhíoctha de 16 seachtain bhreise a thógáil nuair a thagann deireadh leis an gcéad shaoire uchtaíoch – féach thíos
Pay during adoptive leave
Íocaíochtaí le linn saoire uchtaíoch
Your right to adoptive leave means that you have a right to a period of leave from employment without pay
Tá tú i dteideal saoire oibre gan pá a thógáil
However, your contract of employment may provide for payment during the period of leave
Gheobhaidh tú pá le linn do shaoire uchtaíoch áfach, má léirítear a leithéid i do chonradh fostaíochta
If you have enough PRSI contributions you may qualify for Adoptive Benefit which is paid by the Department of Social Protection while you are on adoptive leave
Má d’íoc tú go leor ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC, d’fhéadfaí Sochar Uchtaíoch a fháil ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí nuair a bhíonn tú ar shaoire uchtaíoch
You will not get Adoptive Benefit for the full 24 weeks unless your adoptive leave begins on the date of placement
Mura dtosaíonn do shaoire uchtaíoch ar an dáta ar tháinig an leanbh chugat, ní bhfaighidh tú Sochar Uchtaíoch ar feadh na 24 sheachtain
Additional unpaid adoptive leave
Saoire uchtaíoch bhreise neamhíoctha

Since 1 March 2007 you are also entitled to take up to a further 16 weeks' additional adoptive leave, but this period is not covered by Adoptive Benefit, nor is your employer obliged, unless otherwise agreed, to make any payment during this period

Ón 1 Márta 2007 ar aghaidh, beidh cead agat freisin saoire uchtaíoch neamhíoctha de 16 seachtain bhreise a thógáil, ach ní thagann an tréimhse seo faoi Shochar Uchtaíoch, agus ní bhíonn ar d’fhostóir do thuarastal a íocadh le linn na tréimhse seo, ach amháin nuair a shocraítear a mhalairt
If you become ill you can ask your employer if you can terminate your unpaid additional adoptive leave
Má aontaíonn d’fhostóir, ní bheidh tú i dteideal an fuílleach na saoire máithreachais
If your employer agrees you would then transfer onto sick leave and may receive Illness Benefit or sick pay
Beidh tú ar shaoire breoiteachta agus b'fheidir i dteideal Sochar Breoiteachta a fháil
New parents (other than the mother of the child) can get 2 weeks’ statutory paternity leave from employment or self-employment following the birth or adoption of a child on or after 1 September 2016
Tá tuismitheoirí nua (seachas máthair an linbh) i dteideal 2 seachtain saoire atharthachta reachtúil ó fhostaíocht nó féinfhostaíocht tar éis breithe nó uchtaithe linbh ar nó ón 1 Mheán Fómhair 2016
You are entitled to paid time off work to attend preparation classes and pre-adoption meetings with social workers required during the pre-adoption process
Is féidir leat uchtála saoire fhostaíochta íoctha a thógáil chun páirt a ghlacadh i gcúrsaí ullmhúcháin agus i gcruinnithe réamhuchtála le hoibrithe sóisialta mar chuid den phróiseas réamhuachtála
Public holidays and annual leave
Laethanta saoire poiblí agus saoire bhliantúil
You are entitled to leave for any public holidays that occur during your adoptive leave (including additional adoptive leave)
Is féidir leat laethanta breise a thógáil do na laethanta saoire poiblí le linn do shaoire uchtaíoch (lena n-airítear saoire uchtaíoch bhreise)
The right of employees to leave for public holidays is set down in Section 21 of the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997
Tá cearta an fhostaí maidir le laethanta saoire poiblí leagtha amach in Alt 21 den Acht um Eagraí Ama Oibre 1997

Time spent on adoptive leave (including additional adoptive leave) is treated as though you have been in employment, and this time can be used to accumulate annual leave and public holiday entitlement

Féachtar ar an méid ama a chaithtear ar shaoire uchtaíoch (lena n-airítear saoire uchtaíoch bhreise) mar thréimhse ama a caitheadh ag obair, agus is féidir í seo a úsáid chun teidlíochtaí saoire bhliantúil agus laethanta saoire poiblí a bhaint amach

Under the adoptive leave legislation all employment rights (except remuneration and superannuation benefits) associated with the employment, such as annual leave and seniority, are protected during adoptive leave and additional adoptive leave

De réir na hAchtanna um Shaoire Uchtaíoch 1995 agus 2005 nuair a bhíonn daoine ar shaoire uchtaíoch bhreise, déantar a gcearta fostaíochta (ach amháin luach saothair agus sochair aoisliúntais) a chosaint, mar shampla, saoire bhliantúil agus sinsearacht
Postponement of adoptive leave
Saoire uchtaíoch a chur ar atráth
Since 30 January 2006 if the adopted child is hospitalised, the period of leave or additional leave may be postponed, provided that the employer agrees

Ón 30 Eanáir 2006 ar aghaidh, féadtar an saoire uchtaíoch nó an saoire uchtaíoch bhreise a chur ar atráth má bhíonn ar an leanbh uchtaithe tréimhse ama a chaitheamh san ospidéal agus nuair a aontaíonn an fostóir
Returning to work following adoptive leave
Ag filleadh ar an obair i ndiaidh saoire uchtaíoch a thógáil
The employee has the same rights to return to work as with maternity leave, and must also give 4 weeks' notice of the intention to return

Tá na cearta céanna ag daoine ar shaoire uchtaíoch is atá ag daoine ar shaoire máithreachais filleadh ar an obair, agus bíonn orthu fógra 4 sheachtain a thabhairt dá bhfostóirí nuair a bhíonn sé ar intinn acu filleadh ar an obair
You are entitled to return to the job you had immediately before the leave, unless this is not reasonably practicable for the employer
Is féidir leat filleadh ar an bpost céanna a bhí agat cheana, ach amháin nuair a bhíonn sé ró-dheacair don fhostóir
Where this is the case, then your employer must offer you a suitable and appropriate alternative
Sa chás seo, bíonn ar an bhfostóir post oiriúnach, iomchuí eile a thabhairt duit
The terms and conditions of the alternative and the capacity under which you are to be employed, must not be less favourable than your job before going on leave
Caithfear na téarmaí agus coinníollacha céanna a chur i bhfeidhm agus na tascanna céanna a chomhlíonadh, a bhí á dhéanamh agat roimh shaoire uchtaíoch a thógáil
PRSI contributions: you will automatically be awarded PRSI credits while you are getting Adoptive Benefit
Creidmheasanna ÁSPC: Faigheann tú creidmheasanna go huathoibríoch má bhíonn tú ag fáil Sochar Uchtaíoch
If you avail of unpaid additional adoptive leave you must get your employer to complete an application form for adoptive leave 'credits' (pdf), after you return to work

Má bhaineann tú úsáid as saoire uchtaíoch breise neamhíoctha caithfidh tú a iarraidh ar d’fhostaitheoir an fhoirm iarratais ar chreidmheasanna saoire uchtaíoch (pdf) a líonadh i ndiaidh duit filleadh ar obair
You are protected against unfair dismissal for claiming your rights under adoptive leave legislation
Tá cosaint agat ó dífhostú éagórach má thógann tú saoire uchtaíoch
The rights in relation to return to work apply equally to a new employer where the business has changed hands while the employee was on leave
Bíonn na cearta céanna agat filleadh ar an obair, fiú amháin má bhíonn fostóir nua i gceist toisc athrú bainistíochta le linn na saoire uchtaíoch
Notice: You must give 4 weeks’ notice to your employer of your intention to take adoptive leave (for both foreign and domestic adoptions) before the expected placement of the child
Fogra: Caithfear fógra a thabhairt do d’fhostóir 4 sheachtain roimh shocrú do leanbh uchtaithe (d’uchtuithe eachtracha agus intíre) go bhfuil sé beartaithe agat saoire uchtaíoch a thógáil
As soon as is reasonably practicable you must give your employer the expected date of the placement
Ba cheart duit an dáta socraithe ionchais a thabhairt dod’fhostóir chomh luath agus is féidir leat
If you intend to take the 16 weeks' additional adoptive leave you must provide your employer with at least 4 weeks written notice
Má tá sé ar intinn agat saoire bhreise de 16 seachtaine a thógáil, ní mór duit é seo a chur in iúl dod’fhostóir i scríbhinn 4 seachtaine ar a laghad roimh ré
Both these notices can be given at the same time
Féadtar na fógraí seo a sheoladh isteach ag an am céanna
It is important to comply with the notice requirements as failure to do so may cause loss of rights
Is rud fíor-riachtanach é na ceanglais fógra seo a chomhlíonadh. Mura ndéantar é seo, d’fhéadfá do chearta a chailliúint
You must notify your employer in writing of your intention to avail of adoptive leave
Caithfear a chur in iúl dod’fhostóir i scríbhinn go bhfuil sé beartaithe agat saoire uchtaíoch a thógáil

You must give 4 weeks’ notice and your letter to your employer should clearly outline the date on which you intend to commence adoptive leave. You must give your employer a certificate of placement within 4 weeks of the date of the placement

Caithfear é seo a chur in iúl dod’fhostóir 4 sheachtain roimh ré agus caithfear an dáta atá leagtha amach agat a chur síos go soiléir i do litir agus teastas socraithe a thabhairt dod’fhostóir laistigh de 4 sheachtain tar éis an dáta socraithe
If you need further information about adoptive leave you should contact the Workplace Relations Commission's Information and Customer Service
Má bhíonn a thuilleadh faisnéise á lorg agat ar shaoire uchtaíoch, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an tSeirbhís Fhaisnéise agus Custaiméara an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre
You can read more information in the booklet, Your Adoptive Leave Rights Explained (pdf)
Tá bileog maidir le do chearta ar shaoire uchtaíoch (pdf) ar fáil
Complaints, disputes and grievances relating to adoptive leave can be referred within 6 months of the dispute or complaint occurring
Féadtar gearáin, díospóidí agus casaoidí a bhaineann le saoire uchtaíoch a thabhairt laistigh de 6 mhí
You must use the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie)
Caithfidh tú an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne nua a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
The time limit may be extended for up to a further 6 months, but only where there is a reasonable cause which prevented the complaint being brought within the normal time limit
Is féidir síneadh ama 6 mhí eile a thabhairt duit ach ní dhéanfar é sin mura bhfuil cúinsí réasúnacha ann a chuir cosc ort an gearán a dhéanamh laistigh den gnáth-thréimhse ama

You should apply to the Adoptive Benefit Section of the Department of Social Protection 5 weeks before you intend to start adoptive leave. Where to apply Workplace Relations Commission Information and Customer Service O'Brien Road Carlow R93 W7W2 Ireland Opening Hours: Mon. to Fri
Ba cheart duit iarratas a chur chuig An Rannóg um Shochar Uchtaíoch, An Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí, 5 sheachtain roimh do shaoire uchtaíoch a thosú
